code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function TodoItem(_ref){let{todo,onToggle,onDelete,onEdit}=_ref;const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);const[newText,setNewText]=useState(todo.text);const handleEdit=()=>{if(isEditing&&newText.trim()){onEdit(todo._id,newText);}setIsEditing(!isEditing);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo ".concat(todo.completed?"completed":""),children:[isEditing?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newText,onChange:e=>setNewText(e.target.value)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:todo.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onToggle(todo._id),children:todo.completed?"Undo":"Complete"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleEdit,children:isEditing?"Save":"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(todo._id),children:"Delete"})]})]});}export default TodoItem;
